title: Charles Schwab Impact Conference in San Diego
itunes:title: Charles Schwab Impact Conference in San Diego
description:
Kathy Jones, Chief Fixed Income Strategist at the Schwab Center for Financial Research, discusses fixed-income and the Fed. Peleton CEO John Foley explains why he’s positive after first quarter earnings. Omar Aguilar, CIO of Equities at Charles Schwab Investment Management, talks about why the U.S. remains a stable economic bright spot. Bernie Clark, Head of Charles Schwab Advisor Services, walks through the results of Schwab's Independent Advisor Outlook Study. Liz Ann Sonders, Chief Investment Strategist at Charles Schwab, takes a look at market factors like Brexit and trade. Kim Laughton, President of Schwab Charitable, reflects on 20 years of giving. And we Drive to the Close with Neil Hennessy, CIO and Portfolio Manager at Hennessy Funds.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
